recipesJson.name: Raspberry Candy
recipesJson.author: Kemmo
recipesJson.description: This juice will kill your coils quickly. But it's still a brilliant all day vape. It tastes just like raspberry statburst. lt Vapes like nail polish remover in a dripper, but goes great in a sub ohm tank. It takes higher levels of nicotine very well without losing flavour. Mix and vape at your own risk.

reviews.text: Basic, but really good when you want that sweet fix.  Vaping in a zeus RTA and not getting any off notes.  Steeped for one week so far.
